website_summaries.verdict: The SoundBuds Sport’s comfortable behind-the-head design and noise cancelling technology is a great choice for those of us looking to avoid unwanted distractions during their workout.
pros: Crystal clear sound and noise isolating design
Optimized for smartphones without a headphone jack, like the iPhone 7
cons: Unfortunately, this sporty headset is only available in two colors

customer_reviews.title: Best in this price range
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four or five other pairs of bluetooth wireless headphones in/around this price range. These are without a doubt the best I have found. It's no surprise, coming from Anker, whose backup batteries I have relied upon for years. Honestly, my workouts have never been better because of how much I forget I'm even wearing headphones. They stay snug while sprinting, lifting, stretching, etc. They are also extremely comfortable, very good at sound isolation, and the sound quality is fantastic. My only complaint, and it's something I am willing to sacrifice for all of the other perks, is that the battery life is somewhat short. I would say mine only last about four hours of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value IMHO!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations.But was surprised at the fit and comfort.Sound quality is good also all instruments and vocals are where you'd expect.Unlike se215 which I have also ,there is no mid-range boost but rather all frequencies are well represented.And as a bonus they're comfortable and stay in place.I put them on at 7am and battery is going strong at 3pm I would that's pretty darn good battery life.I have some high end Sony buds which last 2 1/2 between charge!!!I would recommend these for work or play.cheers......norm
customer_reviews.author: NABSTER69

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable wireless set.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of Bluetooth earbuds/phones of any price point. I am very pleased with these for the cost. I have a Pixel 2 XL, and wanted something wireless for working outside in the yard. Sound quality is very good, especially for the price point. I have nice wired headphones, and I would say there is a difference, but I can't compare to other wireless, since I don't have any. I used these working outside, and mowing behind a self-propelled, and they were plenty loud and comfortable to work in. I have not tested the battery life. Mine stayed in place well, for what I was doing. I have not run or anything sporting in them.
customer_reviews.author: Auburngrad

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 for the NB10
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect for exercising. I have tried some other sport bluetooth headsets and have been disappointed. They are either uncomfortable or do not stay in place. I have two pairs for workouts. My other pair is the Plantronics Backbeat Fit which perform really great as well, but are more than double the retail price. The Plantronics sound good, but not as good as these. I like these headphones more mainly because of the snug fit in my ear. The 12mm driver is very clear and gives you just the right amount of thump. I want to buy another pair of these, but in another color. I am hoping Anker releases more colors of these... *hint hint*
customer_reviews.author: inphluence

customer_reviews.title: Best Form Factor. Great for books/podcasts. Crap for music.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these for music. They sound like garbage. But that's not really Anker's fault; it's bluetooth's. They are just fine for spoken word though, and these are easily the best design for wireless earbuds. Just hang there subtly when you take em out. durable. pause/play/vol/wo taking out the phone. Mic works for call. hard to lose. Battery life is okay. Noise cancellation? Uh, none. but as for design, nice job anker.
customer_reviews.author: The Minister

customer_reviews.title: Right ear doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Update. The right ears are not working on all 3 pairs. Disappointed. For the price, I can't complain. Had the powerbeats2 for a few years until the rubber on the volume control rubbed off. Comfortable positioning and pressure is not intrusive. If you plug in the micro usb to power up without turning off the headset first, when you unplug the micro usb, it was auto connect to the last device. The power button is raised higher than the volume which comes in handy. I bought these as well as the Taotronic and prefer these. Update: it started to make clicking noises and now has a high pitch ring in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: I tried a set of the Bluetooth earbuds that had no wire between them and they had MUCH better sound/base. If not for the constan
customer_reviews.text: Probably going to return these. The sound is tinny, almost no base. I tried a set of the Bluetooth earbuds that had no wire between them and they had MUCH better sound/base. If not for the constant losing connection between the two ear pieces I would have kept them. Plus the stiff wire looks ridiculous sticking out from your neck and makes it a challenge to do exercise on your back as with bench press. The earbuds also make my ears pretty sore after only a couple hours and being a distance runner and an avid podcast listener that is a no go. Time to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Xeon

customer_reviews.title: Died after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: Sound died in one ear after about a month of running. Seems to be low quality and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Coldoff

customer_reviews.title: Superior to even the Beats
customer_reviews.text: Superior to even the Beats!!! Bought this as I have used Anker products before and they are a good bang for the buck. Good quality and affordable. Bought this since I hate wrangling with cords during my train commute to work. Nice packaging, with a carry pouch and some extra buds for different ear canal sizes. Easy to pair, good sound, long battery life. One small minor gripe, for whatsapp calls the quality seems to intermittent. I also have a pair of the Powerbeats2 and I keep getting pops, disconnects and really poor mushy sound from it. Tried different bluetooth devices and its the same thing. Save your money and go with the Anker!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shazad Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Sound good, charge port cover hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: This sound good, work ok for calls. The flap for the charger port is really hard to open. As in, if you dont have some kind of tool to dig it out you wont be charging it. Id rip it off if I didnt care about the water protection. It can be really annoying but I usually have something to get it open with anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bockius

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, my wife loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a last minute gift for my wife. Shes a runner and struggles with wired headphones. She isn't an audiophile so I didn't have to worry about her questioning the neutrality of the sound stage or the accuracy of the bass.She can run all week and charge on the weekends. The microphone is far better than expected. I've spoke to her on bluetooth and it was much clearer than the bluetooth in her car. I didn't hear any background noise and she was loud and clear. She thought talking on the cell phone would be very poor because of the location of the microphone, but we were pleasantly surprised! Great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Price, Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for running. They tolerate sweat and they do not slip out of my ears like regular corded or uncorded ear buds (y'all spending a lot of money on those other things that fall out of your ears). These are great. Bluetooth works great. Battery life is good. Charges pretty quickly. Really can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Hissssssssing
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite pair of earphones. I even wrote on the Anker website several times and tagged then in posts to let them know how great it was. The first pair I bought from Walmart the second I got from Amazon. Anytime audio is played it is accompanied by severe hissing. To the point where I just can't use them. It doesn't happen in my sony headphones though. I'm really sad to see ankers product quality dropping. These really used to be top notch headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot H.

customer_reviews.title: What they claim to be
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these for a couple of weeks so this is not a long term review. Set-up was not difficult at all, and that come from person who is over 55. I didn't really purchase these for the noise cancellation but for runs and workouts. The over the ear hooks keep the headphones in place good enough, I am still making adjustments with changing the size of the buds to keep them inserted. These are the first Bluetooth's I have ever purchased, I am happy with my purchase. Over all I would consider these a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for almost two years and I love them. I use them for workouts and the battery life lasts for almost a week of workouts. After a year and a half, I accidentally left the headphones in my pocket and washed and dried my pants, and they still worked afterwards. However, through the washing I ended up losing one of my eartips. I emailed Anker's customer service, and they were able to ship me a new pair of eartips for $3. They emailed every couple days to make sure that I received the eartips. Couldn't have asked for a better, more affordable set up bluetooth headphones and amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Olah

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for working out!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is lightweight and fits my ears perfect. They give you different size earbuds so you have the most complete noise cancellation possible. I never have to worry about them falling off when working out. I had an issue with an old pair where the left side was not working. Without hesitation, their customer support reached out to me and assisted me with my issue. I highly recommend getting a pair not just for the quality but the great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanne

customer_reviews.title: Production needs closer quality control
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Great noise cancellation -Sound quality great, bass better than average -very comfortable to wear for the full 6 hour battery life. Nice adjustable neck band to keep from flipping around while intense workout or runing. -for the above reasons I would give a 4.5 Cons: This will be my second pair I'm returning due to defect. My first pair I bought from walmart and after about 6 months it wouldn't hold a charge. I purchased my second pair from amazon and after my first workout the multifunction button quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Garver

customer_reviews.title: They stay put while working out
customer_reviews.text: Love these bc I can do high intensity training and they stay securely in my ears. They could be louder though and I can certainly hear a lot around me with music playing. But for workouts where you need your headphones to stay put, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HY

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT EARBUDS, GREAT PERFORMANCE & QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for my wife and daughter whom both have somewhat odd shaped ears which require them to wear over the ear type earbuds. They both love these earbuds, excellent sound quality and they stay in place. My wife wears these while walking and hiking and my daughter wears during all kinds of physical activities including pregame warm-ups for her college basketball team. You won't be disappointed with these earbuds and as always Anker products are top-notch quality products.
customer_reviews.author: STINK64

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with how stable they fit!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with these. They just FIT. no problems falling out, don't need to be continually readjusted, not loose! I have tried multiple Bluetooth headsets and these are the most stable. Maybe one downside is the noise isolated aspect is less than ideal and they don't have the worlds best bass. That said, I often have to take them off to have a good conversation in the gym. Once you get them adjust to your fit you'll never go back. Would be nice to see foam eartips for these.
customer_reviews.author: TheDAKSter

customer_reviews.title: Great low prices ear buds. GREAT SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent low priced headphones. Limited volume and noise cancellation, but great sound for small package. Great for working out and running. CUSTOMER SERVICE AND WARRANTY ARE OUTSTANDING!! REPLACED WHEN I HAD AN ISSUE.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Sings Like Angels
customer_reviews.text: First, warning: The retail/Wal-Mart/white box version is inferior. I got a pair from there and it had low muffled sound. My first pair, a long time ago, one speaker finally went out, and I got another, still plugging a along year later. Got yet another pair for work. Excellent sound, noise blocking. Rugged, get quite sweaty in summer.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Pros Battery life seems to be very good as I used these about 7 times in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros Battery life seems to be very good as I used these about 7 times in the last 2 weeks at the gym without charging. Noise isolation is excellent, I really do not hear the loud thumping techno at the gym when these are on Call audio quality is very good so far. Very comfortable fit Cons Sound overall is very muffled. The bass is over exaggerated, perhaps due to the design. Like I said the fit with the large ear piece is perfectly snug for me. Sometimes audio cuts out randomly but very briefly, thought bluetooth 4.1 was supposed to remediate these issues. As much as I love Anker products this one has been a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking headphone for workout, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Bluetooth headphones in a year, none of the other lasted for more than 3 months and all of them are not that good to be use during workout, finally I got this one. Pro: Nice fit, good sound quality, good design and excellence control button. This is the perfect headphone for workout. Cons: I ordered this on Friday with 1 day delivery, hoping I can use it during the race on Sunday. It said it is going to be delevered by Saturday 8PM when I order it. On Saturday it changed to Sunday, so I received the item after the race.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Man

customer_reviews.title: Control Buttons Break Easily
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Once again, the great Anker customer service came through and offered to replace the headphones as they were in warranty. We will see if the buttons last a little longer this time. Maybe it's just bad luck, but this is the second pair of "active" Anker headphones that I have purchased where the control buttons break after months of normal use. I love Anker products, but the active headphone offerings seem to need some work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy sync, good sound but horrible battery life/recharge
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on July 9, 2019 in less than two months they would no longer re charge. I would recharge them every other day because battery life very short (30 to 90 minute runs/workouts) despite turning it off after each use . I contacted anchor support and they responded within 24 hours but could not help with he replacement warranty because bought on Amazon. So either don’t buy them on Amazon I don’t buy these at all !
customer_reviews.author: R. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality for Anker Product
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Anker products, but this one does not meet the standards. I purchased my first a few months ago and had to replace it immediately because of the bluetooth dropping constantly while i was working out.....the replacement worked fine and i was happy, however, it has only last 2 months and i'm having the same problem. i keep it fully charged now to make sure it's not a depleted battery (even though my phone says it's 80%). Too late to send back, so it will get trashed and I will shop for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Great value, for great product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - 11/12/19 While at the gym all the sudden they just stopped working. Got home and tried to turn off and turn back on, but the little red light just blinks rapidly and I can’t even turn off. I’ll be contacting Anker today to see if they can help me resolve the issue. I like to run, but I also want to hear what is happening around me. These fit the bill for letting me run, with some tunes, and still be aware of what’s going on around me. The battery life is great, I charge them about 1x a week. The sound quality is what if it is for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Long

customer_reviews.title: Stops recharging after a few months of use (second pair I've owned...same issue)
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work. I love the way they fit and stay put when I exercise. The issue is it stops charging after a few months of use. I had hoped this was just a bad pair. I actually bought a second pair (without getting a refund for the first pair because it had been beyond the regular return window on Amazon), but unfortunately have had the same exact issue. They're basically a really light paperweight at this point. I still love Anker as a brand as I've had good luck with other products they make, but I will not try their Sports Buds a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T Blanding

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these earbuds!! The quality of sound is awesome. They fit well and have other sizes that come with the earbuds to choose your own fit. They have great sound control and while using them you can still hear outsie sounds so that if you are outside for fitness purposes you will be able to hear oncoming traffic/emergency vehicles. While the control buttons may be little difficult to use while wearing them I began to adjust them before putting them on and keep them set in that mode so I have no problems with them. Overall, for the great price on these, I easily give them 5 stars and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: worked as expected, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sync, use, and a decent battery-life. However, they were not the most comfortable. prolonged use caused pain in my ear, and I would take a break to ease the discomfort. I have since lost them, which I blame on the compact design; not my own forgetfulness. If my ear was a different shape I would buy them again. good luck with your search
customer_reviews.author: RedHanded

customer_reviews.title: Short Range, Rough Sound
customer_reviews.text: very choppy, even at short ranges it cuts out and dont go out more than 15 feet. If thats what its supposed to do then sorry, but with the high quality Ive come to expect from Anker I was disappointed. ****UPDATE*** After writing this review I was contacted by anker customer care. They asked a few questions via email, asked me for the s/n of my defective product, and promptly sent me a new set of headphones, which I received yesterday. While I have not tested them yet, I have to give them credit for great customer service and faith in their product. 10 31 16
customer_reviews.author: TechSupport2U

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't fit and no solutions from Anker
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I could not get these to stay in my ears regardless of trying every possible combination of buds with this. After contacting Anker directly and asking if they had any other suggested buds/tips, and expecting they could suggest something that would fit these stems, they told me I could just return them. The product felt well made and if I forced them into my ears and held them there manually, they seemed to sound good too.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the Backbeat Fit for 1/2 the price
customer_reviews.text: I also have the Plantronics Backbeat Fit headphones, which retail for > $100, and these Anker headphones are just as good. Sure there's no pleasant woman telling you when you've reached maximum volume and how much battery life is left....however, these headphones get MUCH louder than the Backbeat Fit, which is what I needed for running on my treadmill and listening to Netflix. Why does DareDevil have to speak so quietly?? Well done Anker, well done indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Carls Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Crushed my first pair, washed my second...now unavailable!
customer_reviews.text: These guys were great! Daily use a the gym for 3 years and the only issue has been that I was ripping the charging port cover. Should have stockpiled these...when will I learn???
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mikicich

customer_reviews.title: Anker has great products & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Have had my NB10 Bluetooth earbuds since May 2017 (one of a number of Anker products that I own). Great sound, bluetooth is flawless. After 7-8 months the L earbud went out, I notified Anker & got a brand new replacement in < 2 weeks! Cannot beat that for customer support. Great product, good price, great customer service/support.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHI

customer_reviews.title: Works great with solid warranty
customer_reviews.text: Quality headset for almost a year, left earpiece lost sound after roughly 10 months of use but Anker was great about replacing the headset. Worked great until the left speaker died (which seems to be common across most wireless headsets...not sure why). Would buy again knowing that the warranty process is seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McNeely

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?!
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, work great, battery life is great, what's not to like? My wife has the name brand (B**ts) equivalent and I think these actually sound better for a MUCH lower cost. If they last me 6 months to a year, I'll feel I got my money's worth and buy another pair. A winner, don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: buccscott

customer_reviews.title: Great value, pefect for running.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a bit to figure out what size ear buds worked best but now these fit great and are very comfortable and secure. I use them during my morning runs and they're the best ear buds I've used so far. They pair with all my wireless devices quickly and have good sound quality. The unique behind the head/neck wire is a great design for exercise. Keeps the ear buds very secure and no bouncing wire while running.
customer_reviews.author: JNB

customer_reviews.title: Best Earbuds I've ever owned for working out, running or everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Best Earbuds I've ever owned for working out, running or everyday use. The over the ear hook design keeps them in place and the microphone works fine. It comes with multiple size ear bud attachments so you can get the right fit. I've used mine for full 8 hour work days, with several hours of calls and listening to audio books. They're so comfortable that I've fallen asleep with them on. I'd recommend to anyone especially with an active life. And the price point is great. Thank you Anker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crippen

customer_reviews.title: What I expect listening to a woodchipper would sound like.
customer_reviews.text: I've used alot of Bluetooth earphones in the past. I've had terrible ones, good ones and "meh" ones. But this is by far the worst set I've ever used by leagues (in terms of audio quality).
customer_reviews.author: Caleb B.

customer_reviews.title: Broker after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used these Anker headphones for running and working out. I bought these to replace ones I lost. The sound quality was worse then my previous pairs and much quieter. Even worse, the power button stopped working out of the blue 3 months after I bought them. Despite a full charge, there is no way to turn them on anymore. Very disappointed! These were my favorite workout headphones earlier. I used them about 3 times a week and always stored them carefully.
customer_reviews.author: TaraM.

customer_reviews.title: Will not turn on or charge
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get my new headset because of all the other reviews I read...but when I received them they wouldn't turn on. I figured they needed to be charged even though a lot of reviews stated that there was some battery life out of the box. I charged the headset for 8 hours and they still wont turn on. Now I am without headphones and have to deal with the hassle of returning them and waiting for my refund so I can purchase another pair. I won't have another pair of headphones now for at least a week and a half...UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works great but with a longevity issue
customer_reviews.text: These are super. I use them for everything from conference calls, listening to podcasts while driving, to on trail when mountain biking. Great for all, with one issue: over time the ear pieces get "loose" and fall off when removing from your ears. At a desk, no big deal. On a trail? It's gone forever and no replacements are available that I can find. I like them enough that I bought a second pair after losing the earpieces on the first pair, but sure wish I could just get new earpieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good but take a while to get a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of inexpensive seriously sweat resistant wireless headphones for working out, so I don’t ruin my Beats x .. These do the job well. It takes a while to get a good fit and decent immersive sound out of them (I literally played around with ear piece size and fit adjustment for a week before I tuned myself in properly) but I’m there now. My confidence in this brand remains very high, I must note their customer service is extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: Labelchap

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing BT range and mediocre sound quality
customer_reviews.text: When riding my bike, they tend to slip out of my ears gradually over time. I keep my iPhone 7 plus in the back pocket of my cycling jersey and if I turn my head completely left while cycling I lose connectivity so the BT range is disappointing. If you put your phone anywere around your waist you may have issues with connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: 801Jones

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this almost exactly 19 months ago. They ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this almost exactly 19 months ago. They were used only once or twice a week during the summer doing outdoor chores. They're very clumsy to use with the three very closely-spaced buttons on top of the right earpiece, with the middle button having multiple functions. The reason I mentioned how long ago they were ordered was because with the 18 month warranty now expired, they do not charge, so now worthless, even after limited seasonal use. Certainly not worth the price considering the limited life of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Anker's inexpensive earbuds are 30% the price of Jaybirds, and much better.
customer_reviews.text: The SoundBuds NB10 are pretty good! They work well, with decent sound, simple connectivity, logical inputs, excellent ear-fit (even when jogging), and easy to adjust and insert...for $40, you can't beat the quality workmanship. The only weaknesses are short battery time, and mediocre sound quality - but good enough for me. I bought the Jaybird X2's last year for $150, and they were total garbage, always dying even when charged, difficult to put in my ear (and stay there, they always fell out no matter which bud-covers I tried), and malfunctioning frequently. They finally quit completely at 13 months....NEVER BUY JAYBIRD, ANKER ROCKS.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nicholas Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound and worse mic. Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Anker products but this is an exception. Major issues include poor sound quality (can’t hear dialogues when outdoors), doesn’t stay on if you are wearing sunglasses, and very bad mic quality - so bad that the other person can’t hear you clearly even if there is no ambient noise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaw

customer_reviews.title: The sound good. But, like to slip
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds sound pretty good. Paired well with my phone and are easy to use. However, When doing physical activity such as running or yard work the earbuds work their way out of my ear a little bit. I have to push them in every 5-10 minutes to get the full sound quality, which is rather annoying when I am running etc. They need to go back to the drawing board on how they fit. Follow up review : They stopped working after 17 months of use. I used 3-4 times a week for running and yard work. Last week they stopped charging and working. Not bad for the price just a little disappointed they stopped working so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite headphones, my workout is so dull without these.
customer_reviews.text: I love how in the ad description it says six hours is more than enough for a weeks workout, but I'm a gymrat who will literally go to the gym for three hours at a time.(Which is my own problem). If i forget to charge these everyday they do die during my workout. But love the way they fit, and LOVE that they are relatively sweat proof. Good pricing too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin fenton

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of headphones. They stand up to hard use and wet weather. Speakers are mediocre along with the noise cancellation. However, from a cost perspective I have yet to find something comparable. I work in construction and also use for trail runs.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is that they always fall out of my ears. My husband doesn’t seem to have this problem and loves his.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Until...
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are great sounding (high bass) cheap and they are great for working out. I loved these earbuds until they stopped working 3 month's after purchasing them
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for the price; good enough for a pop music workout track; lacks bass range and higher range; not good for classical music. Still these have a better sound than the original phone speaker and headphones.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tohline

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product BUT.... earbuds fall off far too easy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product other than the ear bud pieces fall off if rubbed against stuff. It comes with different size replacements, but now that i've lost one of all of them, I can't use this anymore -_- Like, it was on my neck. From my car to the gym locker room, somehow lost one bud. Shouldn't come off that easy. Literally a great product other than that. ANKERRRRR. Please help and let me buy replacement ear buds. Thanks you =]
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds, paired up easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice earbuds, paired up easy. I am getting some static every now and then but not sure if thats the earbuds fault. The biggest downside is the ear pieces are too heavy for running-- but for everything else I've been happy. Update: Turns out it's not the ear pieces that are a problem for running. The strap in the back shakes when I run. Fixed the problem by stuffing it in my running cap.
customer_reviews.author: ec

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Connection Keeps dropping
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound and fit of these headphones. However the bluetooth connection to my iPhone 6 drops when I use them while running. It's very annoying to have to turn the phones back on every 5 minutes to reconnect. I have 2 other bluetooth headphones that don't have this issue. Update: Now they won’t turn on even though they’re fully charged:(
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is a day one review as I got the ear buds in the mail and immediately went to the gym (not running outside in NYC weather this time of year). These headphones are AMAZING. They stayed on my ears without issues and since they are wireless there is no annoying knockin sound with the wire hitting you. The noise isolation seemed pretty good but that will be updated upon further outdoor running. Barring any issues these will be the best ear buds I have ever purchased. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: boyd perkins

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive headphones with Anker quality.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything else Anker makes these headphones have a solid build quality and feel very durable. The sound quality isn't the best but isn't expected to be when they are under $50. Battery life is good and the fit is nice and tight. I would definitely recommend these if you're​ looking for a good and inexpensive set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Bann

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: After about 20 months of light use the right headphone stopped working. I didn't expect that to happen. I used them rarely during this time. Initially, twice a month and then once weekly. The left headphone is fine the right one speed making sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, great headphones for running
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for running. I am very particular about the headphones that I use when running since I have small ears and other headphones tend to fall out or not sit right. These headphones are snug and stay in without any fidgeting/fussing while running. I was very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cameron P

customer_reviews.title: Poor volume
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Ok sound quality. Poor volume. All conversations could be heard whilst wearing these headphones on it's maximum volume. I even tried messing with my phones volume settings. Nothing made these headphones louder so as to drown out even just regular volume'd conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anker f'n Rocks! Love their products!
customer_reviews.text: Great! As expected, less bass than the headphones (wired) that came with my phone but an overall great sound and plenty of range. The Bluetooth connects through walls and I'm able to go into the next room with no loss during music playback or phone conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Pamunkey

customer_reviews.title: Premium earbuds and superb customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got these in 2016 and they're still working. Although with some minor issues like shorter battery life and some noise on the highs. For the price and the sound quality, these are by no means deal-breakers. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alvis

customer_reviews.title: Static-ky when hook to my Huawei Smartwatch.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of this. I do a lot of inversions in my gym, so finally having something that is tighter helps. The one thing I don't get is a hear a lot of static when I hook it to my Huawei smartwatch. When I BT connect to my cell phone, it's not as bad, but I have other BT headsets that work without any static problems. I wonder if it is a noise cancellation issue?
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great fitment, well balanced sound, comfortable, great battery life, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these SoundBuds NB10 for the gym. Fitment was my top priority, after trying few other in ear Bluetooth headphones with less than satisfactory result. I'm happy to report that these fit great, secure and comfortable after 2 hour use at the gym. The sound is well balanced even with volume at 80% which is plenty loud. Battery life is as advertised, some charge left after 2 gym sessions, roughly 4 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chang R. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a bit skeptically but it was a good purchase. The sound is of good quality for the price and the bluetooth range is great. I have only needed to charge them once so far. Another bonus is the very nice packaging - it includes a bag and a plethora of accessories to adjust the sizing. I have smaller ears and the smallest set works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: You won't be constantly adjusting these!
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting, good sound. I have been able to use these up to 35 feet from my phone before they start to cut out. A little tricky getting them on the first time because of the design. Once you have the ear canal part in the right place, then no problems. The sound is good, better than smaller earbuds. The noise reduction is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound,
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with the correct sized eartips so now I have to deal with Anker support to try to obtain them. Otherwise the earbuds are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Holt

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wireless option for listening to podcasts and ballgames while I worked outside or went for a walk. These are perfect for the job. Very comfortable and lightweight. I've had lots of success with Anker products. They don't disappoint here.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McClary

customer_reviews.title: I use multiple times per week, recommended.
customer_reviews.text: fit is great, doesn't move around while running. buttons are easy to use. sweat and rain proof in my experience. 4 stars only b/c I seem to get only ~ 1 year out of them before a replacement is needed. However, Anker support is fantastic and replacements sent without much hassle. great value.
customer_reviews.author: bashburn

customer_reviews.title: Bought better ones at Five Below?  Doesn't fit and volume is crap
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these as they kept slipping off my ears annoying the crap out of me and the sound was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Piper Golden

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have been great. To be honest, the sound isn't top notch, but it is still very good. The battery life is great as well and it charges quickly. The customer service has been great as well. I lost one of the tips that fit in the ear (my fault totally) and when I emailed them to see if I could buy some replacements they told me that they don't normally sell parts like that, but would check to see if there were any available in the warehouse. Thankfully there were, and they only charged me for shipping ($1.50). They arrived today and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Battery life is better than expected. Sound is average but fine for everyday activities like walking, running or biking. I've noticed slight stuttering only very occasionally. Not sure if the culprit is the headphones or my iPhone 6S. Excited to have headphones that can take some rain/sweat and let me keep the phone in a waterproof pocket!
customer_reviews.author: ZackH

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!  The best fitting pair of active activity bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! The best fitting pair of active activity bluetooth headphones! I've tried dozens and all suck. They fall out, ill fitting or the cords get in the way. This is the best form fitting for my ears I've felt and the head straps keep everything in place rather than having loose wire swinging around. I'd give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: The product is very well designed and is comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well designed and is comfortable to wear. It has great features like volume control, a mic, etc. However, the biggest problem is the bluetooth connection quality. I have a Galaxy S6 and the connection goes in and out. When I hold the phone or place it in my right pocket, the connection is fine. If I place it in my left pocket, the sound cuts out and even stops completely at times. I am not very satisfied and have reached out to Anker to address this is issue. I have owned a number of Anker products have been really impressed. This product, however, may need some work.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Turk

customer_reviews.title: Good product & Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last March and it was exactly the product I needed. I never had issues with connectivity like I've had with other products I've purchased elsewhere. A year in, I did have some issues with the right side, but was immediately provided a replacement. I'm really happy with the customer service and will definitely stick with Anker for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality no better than the buds I bought these to replace
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality no better than the buds I bought these to replace; battery life not much better either - and they're heavier, and the old buds told me how much battery life remained. Slightly more comfortable than the old buds, FWIW.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: These are  great for the price -- indestructible too
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have had -- Lost the first pair while skiing. What I can say is that the battery last a long time and they really are water resistant / proof -- have accidentally washed these in the washing machine several times with no damage...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Have used a few times to include military runs and also in the sauna during high heat. I tend to sweat a lot and these never had an issues for me. The snug fit also helped keep the headphones in place. My last pair of jaybirds are being clearly outshines by Anker! Great design Anker, looking forward to doing more to test these out further.
customer_reviews.author: R. Craig

customer_reviews.title: for the price they are great
customer_reviews.text: you are not going to get the booming base of external speakers, but for working in the yard or in the gym, they are great. They don't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: J Renee

customer_reviews.title: One size does NOT fit all...
customer_reviews.text: While the item looks great and sound good (bass is spot on) the right ear piece would not stay in place. It would repetitively come off the top of the ear and eventually the earbud would fall out. I tried changing out the earbuds to larger and smaller sizes and also tried adjusting the FitClip. The more movement the quicker it dislodges. It is better for smaller heads apparently. Bummer being it was a Father's Day gift!
customer_reviews.author: Alsita D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones recently and have been trying them out for almost a week. The style is nice and simple. The functions are extremely easy to use. The sound is not all that great, and personally they seem over priced to me. Would I recommend these to someone? Most likely not! I'd tell them to purchase the Phaiser BHS-730 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Not sweatproof as original title says, but not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm only writing this review now because I remembered the title of the posting saying sweatproof, but now all of a sudden the right bud has stopped working completely. These were great and I thought I would get at least two years out of them, but that's not the case. Still looking truly 100% sweatproof bluetooth earbuds...
customer_reviews.author: Shweez

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses them when he works out and does yard work. He says they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds! Lost my first pair so these were a replacement. They stay in my ears which I love. I have also become a fan of Anker in general and have several of their products. I don't need the most expensive gear and I have found Anker to be a good quality brand at a reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Craig  M. Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: ... ever left and the reason is because these are fantastic. I tried the Beats Wireless 2 and they ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I've ever left and the reason is because these are fantastic. I tried the Beats Wireless 2 and they were awful. I had to swap out 4 times because the sweat would malfunction the head phones. I'm on my second pair of these because I lost the first pair, they've still cost me 1/3 of what I paid for the Beats. I can't recommend enough. I've had no problem connecting quickly to my iphone and the sound is always clear. The head band tightener is also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Shockley

customer_reviews.title: They sound great, they fit great
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for almost 8 months now, and they are phenomenal. They sound great, they fit great, the battery still lasts about 6 hours, and Anker customer support is amazing. Never had an issue connecting to both Android and iPhone, and I often switch between the two with no problem. The only negative about these headphones is that the ear inserts pop off the headphones way too easily. I recently lost one insert because of this, and Anker support sent me a free replacement set. Best on the go headphones I've owned in a long time, and I usually chew through them.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love these for listening to podcasts during my activities. When my Anker headphones had a problem with charging, the Anker support team quickly verified the issue and happily sent me a replacement under the 18 month h warranty. I did. Not have the hassle of returning the problem device. I received the new working device in a matter of days from opening the case.
customer_reviews.author: Seth A Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay, but not great. Fits well. Controls are okay too, but interface could be a little better. Only gives you a warning that the battery is about to die a minute before it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo C.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: They were nice for the short time I had them. I am used to the LG Tone style headphones and left these around my neck when I wasn't using them the very first day and lost them. XD don't be like me!
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: Gave two as gifts They are close to the best you can get for a cheaper BT
customer_reviews.text: Own one, my wife has one, and have given two as gifts They are the best you can get for the price, imo. Snug fit, stays out of the way whole your active, and super lite weight. Plus come in a few colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Major NumbNut

customer_reviews.title: The quality of sound, fit and durability is very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and secure fit for the money
customer_reviews.author: Billy Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Rockin and a Runnin
customer_reviews.text: These things Rock!!! Love them... Once you get the neck support set and familiarize yourself w/ the function buttons, you're on your way!
customer_reviews.author: Bam Bam

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas present and was very excited because i Love Anker products
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a Christmas present and was very excited because i Love Anker products! Took them for a run to test them out and they were great quality and fit my ears great. When it's time to charge them i plugged them in and left them charging overnight, however they didn't seem to take a charge. I tried several different cords and power supplies but they never took a charge. Like i said i love Anker products but i'm sad i got a dud for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Masingale

customer_reviews.title: and she absolutely loved them, they are very comfortable and sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing, I have been buying Anker products for a few years now and bought these headphones after reading all the reviews on them, and I can tell you that these have been the best headphones I've ever bought. It's been over a year that I've had them, plus accidentally washed them twice and the sound on them is still incredible. They usually last me about 4.5 hours non-stop and take about an hour to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac F Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect from Anker
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, but not very comfortable. Battery life is awful. Lucky if I get 2 hours. First Anker product I’ve been disappointed in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepster

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great service.
customer_reviews.text: Not just a great product, but great company. Got heavy use out of mine. Loved the sound and simplicity. Had a small problem with reduced sound out of left ear bud. Contacted them via the Anker forum—customer service was in touch to try to troubleshoot, and when it didn’t pan out, replaced the NB10s no charge and no shipping. That’s standing by your product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ear volume low.
customer_reviews.text: Left ear volume is 30% now. It’s only been a few months.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

product_meta.title: Anker AK-A3260011 SoundBuds Sport NB10 Bluetooth Headphones, IPX5 Water-Resistant Bluetooth Headset with Adjustable Neckband, Sport Earbuds with Mic and CVC 6.0 Noise Cancellation for Work Out,
product_meta.description: Anker AK-A3260011 SoundBuds Sport NB10 Bluetooth Headphones IPX5 Water-Resistant Bluetooth Headset with Adjustable Neckband Sport Earbuds with Mic and CVC 6 0 Noise Cancellation for Work Out
feature_bullets: Perfect fit for sports flexible hooking design customizable fit clips and ear tips ensure a secure and comfortable hold through the most extreme training
Water-resistant run in the rain or sweat it out at the gym IPX5 water-resistant shell and internal Nano-coating provide a double layer of water protection
Powerful sound oversized 12mm audio drivers deliver incredibly clear wireless audio to push you through the hardest workouts

Advanced technology Universally compatible portable Bluetooth 4 1 headphones work with any Bluetooth-enabled device (including iPhone 7) Connect effortlessly and enjoy up to 6 hours of continuous playtime
What you get sound Buds Sport NB10 wireless headphones Micro USB cable 3 pairs of ear tips (S/M/L) 2 fit clips travel pouch welcome guide our worry-free 18 month and friendly customer service
